column1: Associazione Sportiva Noicattaro Calcio was an Italian association football club located in Noicattaro
column2: Apulia. Its colors were black and red.
Noicattaro won the division H of Serie D league thus gaining its first promotion ever in Serie C2.

column1: In its last season it played in Lega Pro Seconda Divisione. Following bankruptcy in 2010
